definitions.body: dross (what is removed from metal);—abs. [[סִיג]] Ez Eze 22:18 Qr ([[סוג]] Kt), [[שִׂיג]] 1Ki 18:27 ([[שׂ]] for [[ס]], but v. infr.); pl. [[סִיגִים]] (van d. H. [[סִגִּים]]) Is 1:22 + 3 t.; [[סִגִַים]] Ez Eze 22:18 + 2 t.; sf. [[סִיגׇ֑יְִ]] Is 1:25; —
a moving back, away: [[שִׂיג לוֹ]] 1Ki 18:27 there is a moving back to him = he has moved back, away (prob. of temporary withdrawal, diff. from [[דֶּרֶח]] journey).

dross, usu. of silver Pr 25:4 ([[מִכָָּסֶף]]), Pr 26:23 (´[[כֶּסֶף ס]]), so (fig. of Isr.) Is 1:22 cf. v.Is 1:25, Ez Eze 22:18 b ([[סִיגִים כֶּסֶף]] MT, [[בְּתוֹח]] ´[[ס]] ´[[כ]] LXX Co Berthol;—Co del. ´[[ס]] not so Berthol Toy), cf. v:Eze 22:18 a, v:Eze 22:19; indef. Ps 119:119.
